'QualWeb' --path './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-qualweb/reports/*.json'","getImplementationRgaa":"node ./build/get-implementation --org 'Access42' --tool 'RGAA 4.0' --path './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-rgaa/reports/*.json'","getImplementationTrustedTester":"node ./build/get-implementation --org 'Trusted Tester' --tool 'Trusted Tester' --path './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-trusted-tester/reports/*.json'","getImplementations":"npm run getImplementationAccessEngine && npm run getImplementationAlfa && npm run getImplementationAxeCore && npm run getImplementationRgaa && npm run getImplementationTrustedTester && npm run getImplementationQualWeb","getWcagData":"node ./build/get-wcag-data","implementations":"npm run getImplementations && npm run createImplementationsMetrics","prebuild":"npm run clean && npm run formatRulesDir && npm run getData","pregetImplementationAxeCore":"npm --prefix './node_modules/act-rules-implementation-axe-core/' run build -- --testsJson ${PWD}/_data/rules-testcases/testcases.json --testsDir ${PWD}/_data/rules-testcases --siteUrl $npm_package_www_url","pretest":"npm run getData","serve":"gatsby serve","start":"npm run clean && npm run develop","test":"jest --coverage"},"version":"1.0.0","www":{"url":"https://act-rules.github.io"}}
